title: Swap quiz translation control UI to a bold “Plan-B” sign while preserving press-and-hold behavior

requirements.summary: Replace the flag + “hilfe” translation control UI with a funny, bold, sign-like “Plan-B” text treatment in QuizGameplay.
acceptanceCriteria: The translation control no longer renders `/assets/generated/english-flag-icon-v2.dim_24x24.png` nor the "hilfe" label.
The control renders the text "Plan-B" with a visually distinct, sign-like styling (e.g., bold, bordered/badge-like treatment) that reads as intentionally funny.
The control remains located in the same place (right side of the question header area) and remains clickable/touchable.

file_operations.description: In the question header translation control, remove the flag and the "hilfe" label. Replace them with a single "Plan-B" text element styled to read like a bold, funny sign (e.g., badge-like border, strong font weight, slightly playful/handmade feel via subtle rotation/uppercase/letterspacing using existing Tailwind utility classes). Keep the control in the same header location and preserve its button hit-area.

requirements.summary: Keep the existing press/hold translation interaction and disabled/loading behavior while changing only the control’s visual presentation.
acceptanceCriteria: Pointer/mouse/touch press-and-hold events continue to trigger translation exactly as before.
When `isTranslating` is true, the loading indicator still appears and the control is disabled (no translation toggling while disabled).

file_operations.description: Ensure the translation control continues to use the existing press-and-hold event handlers (pointer/mouse/touch) and release/cancel handlers unchanged. Preserve the current disabled={isTranslating} behavior and keep showing the Loader2 spinner while translating; only swap the non-loading UI to the "Plan-B" sign text.

requirements.summary: Make all user-facing text for the control English and aligned with the new “Plan-B” presentation while still communicating press-and-hold translation behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: No German label (e.g., "hilfe") is shown for this control.
The control has an English tooltip/title and/or aria-label that communicates the press-and-hold translation action.

file_operations.description: Update the translation control’s accessible/user-facing strings to English and consistent with the new "Plan-B" UI (e.g., keep/update title and add/adjust aria-label to communicate "Press and hold to translate to English"). Remove any remaining German text related to the control.
